name: wickedcoolkit.com
description: A fun, nostalgic web toolkit built on Heroku and Salesforce.

scripts.build: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run build:production || npm run build:dev
scripts.minify: for file in public/resources/*.css; do cat $file | postcss > ${file%.*}.min.css; done
scripts.serve: if-env PORT && serve -l $PORT public || serve public
